definitions.definition: ( Greek mythology ) A king who sought and was for a while granted the cherished but subtly dangerous magical power to turn anything he touched into gold .

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) A king who sought and was for a while granted the cherished but subtly dangerous magical power to turn anything he touched into gold .

definitions.definition: A very large champagne bottle (named after the King) with the capacity of about 30 liters , equivalent to 40 standard bottles.

main_definition: A very large champagne bottle (named after the King) with the capacity of about 30 liters , equivalent to 40 standard bottles.
